Package fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter_etudiant.admissioncontroller.interfaces

Interface AdmissionControllerServicesI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentServiceI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdmissionControllerServicesConnector, AdmissionControllerServicesInboundPort, AdmissionControllerServicesOutboundPort
    public interface AdmissionControllerServicesI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredI
    The interface AdmissionControllerServiceI defines the services offered by Admission Controller components (allocating and releasing free avms).

    Description

    Allocate or recycle free AVM from performance controller

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : January 16, 2019

    Author:
    Chao LIN

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.Map<ApplicationVM.ApplicationVMPortTypes,java.lang.String> allocateFreeAVM()
      allocate one free AVM to the performance controller and return the inbound port uri of the AVM allocated; return null if no free AVM is available.
      fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.computers.Computer.AllocatedCore[] findComputerAndAllocateCores​(int nbCore)
      find an idle cores
      void recycleFreeAVM​(java.lang.String AVMuri)
      recycle a free AVM previously allocated to a performance controller.
